text: David Lee West (September 1, 1964 - May 14, 2022), was an American professional baseball player. He was born in Memphis, Tennessee. West played for the Major League Baseball from 1988 until 1998. He played for the New York Mets, Minnesota Twins, Philadelphia Phillies and Boston Red Sox. West died on May 14, 2022 from glioblastoma at the age of 57. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from glioblastoma Category:New York Mets players Category:Minnesota Twins players Category:Philadelphia Phillies players Category:Boston Red Sox players Category:Sportspeople from Memphis, Tennessee
title: David West (baseball)
